name: geospatial-data-processor-and-visualizer
description: A real time geospatial data processor and visualizer disaster management application

scripts.install: git submodule update --init --recursive && cd visualizer-server && npm install && cd ../web-interface && npm install
scripts.start: cd visualizer-server && npm start && cd ../web-interface && npm start
scripts.test: cd visualizer-server && npm test && cd ../web-interface && npm test
